        Get an existing or create a new project for a given language
        Parameters:
        projectSupport - project support instance (for a given programming language)
        projectName - the name of the project to create (or get, if it already exists)
        targetLanguage -
        modelRoot -
        Returns:
        the project or null, if no project creation support is available for the target language

        TransformationException

      • getProjectName

        public String getProjectName(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package model,
                             org.eclipse.uml2.uml.InstanceSpecification node)
        Return the name of a project that is associated with a model that is deployed on a node (in the context of a deployment plan). The function takes a user defined project name into account
        Parameters:
        model - The model that is deployed
        node - The node onto which the software is deployed
        Returns:
        The resulting project name
